titleStmt.title: Alfred Wotquenne
born Lobbes, Hainault, Jan 25, 1867; died Antibes, Sept 25, 1939

publicationStmt.publisher: Schenker Documents Online in association with the Centre for Computing in the Humanities

sourceDesc.p: No source: created in electronic format.

encodingDesc.p: Encoding according to the CCH TEI Guidelines

div.p: Belgian music bibliographer, editor and collector.

Wotquenne was librarian of the library of the Royal Conservatory in Brussels 1894-1918, and during his tenure there reorganized and catalogued the library, as well as building up the collection. He also published a thematic catalogue of the works of C. P. E. Bach, as well as of the works of Gluck, of Rossi, and catalogues of other repertories.

listBibl.bibl: Thematisches Verzeichnis der Werke von Carl Philipp Emanuel Bach (Leipzig, 1905)
